**Notice Details**                                      |                                     **Détails du communiqué**

* **Solicitation #:** 23-227744/b
* **Publication Date:** January 17, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 8, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST
* **Status:** The solicitation has been cancelled.
* **Description:**

This procurement has been cancelled.

**Trade Agreements:**
* The contract is open to suppliers who have demonstrated compliance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The contract is open to suppliers who have demonstrated compliance with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
* The contract is open to suppliers who have demonstrated compliance with the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
* The contract is open to suppliers who have demonstrated compliance with the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
* The contract is open to suppliers who have demonstrated compliance with the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
* The contract is open to suppliers who have demonstrated compliance with the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Regions of Opportunity:** 
* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Regions of Delivery:** 
* Canada

**Contracting Entity:**

* Name: Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Department of)
* Address: 125 Sussex Dr., Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G2, Canada
* Contact: Francine Marcotte
* Email: francine.marcotte@international.gc.ca

**Note:** This contract has been cancelled. Suppliers who previously submitted tenders will be notified once an alternate procurement is announced.
